azurerm_redis_firewall_rule.description: Manages a Firewall Rule associated with a Redis Cache.

name.description: The name of the Firewall Rule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

redis_cache_name.description: The name of the Redis Cache. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which this Redis Cache exists.

start_ip.description: The lowest IP address included in the range

end_ip.description: The highest IP address included in the range.

id.description: The ID of the Redis Firewall Rule.
